summary: An ordinary Soviet citizen accidentally intervenes into a huge operation of international criminal group that trades illegally obtained jewelry.
cast: Yuriy Nikulin|Nina Grebeshkova|Andrey Mironov|Anatoliy Papanov|Stanislav Chekan|Vladimir Gulyaev|Nonna Mordyukova|Svetlana Svetlichnaya|Roman Filippov|Grigoriy Shpigel|Leonid Kanevskiy|Igor Yasulovich|Maksim Nikulin|Aleksandra Lisyutina|Aleksandr Khvylya|Nikolay Romanov|Andrey Fayt|German Kachin|Vasiliy Kupriyanov|Yevgeniya Melnikova|Tatyana Nikulina|Viktoriya Ostrovskaya|Pegas|Lev Polyakov|Georgiy Svetlani|Nikolay Trofimov|Viktor Uralskiy|Georgiy Vitsin|Apollon Yachnitskiy|Ivan Zhevago|Ermengeld Konovalov|Leonid Pleshakov
title: El brazo de brillantes
